channel.description: Recent content in water on Dan Tanner

item.title: Mountain Bike Frame Hydration Hack
item.description: I’ve been carrying water on my frame using a custom solution the last couple seasons. I originally googled for a solution and didn’t find anything commercially available, but found lots of helpful posts in various forums explaining what folks have done. It’s worked really well, so thought I’d share a bundle of details in case anyone else is interested. If you know of an existing commercial solution that does all this, let me know and I’ll update the post.
